author: bnicholes
msg: Initialize the rebind functionality early within the APR library itself to avoid application unload issues. This ties apr to apr-util however on NetWare both libraries are combined.

author: bnicholes
msg: Static global variables are bad on NetWare. Move them into the library application data area.

author: bnicholes
msg: Static global variables are bad on NetWare. Move them into the library application data area.  Also implement the rebind callback for the Novell SDK.
